TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_damsay, title = damsay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/damsay} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:親切溫柔) damsay ku kamu ni Libuk tu tademaw. Libuk 對人說話很親切溫柔.
(kamo no holam:親切溫柔) damsay ko kamo ni Libok to tademaw. Libok 對人說話很親切溫柔.
